code: import React from"react";import{jsxs as _jsxs,jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const EditRecipeForm=_ref=>{let{selectedRecipe,handleCancel,onUpdateForm,handleUpdateRecipe}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"recipe-form",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("h2",{children:["Edit \"",selectedRecipe.title,"\""]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"cancel-button",onClick:handleCancel,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:e=>handleUpdateRecipe(e,selectedRecipe),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Title"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"title",value:selectedRecipe.title,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e,"update"),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Ingredients"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"ingredients",value:selectedRecipe.ingredients,placeholder:"Add ingredients separated by commas - i.e. Flour, sugar, almonds",onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e,"update"),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Instructions"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"instructions",value:selectedRecipe.instructions,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e,"update"),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Description"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{name:"description",value:selectedRecipe.description,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e,"update"),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Image"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",name:"image_url",value:selectedRecipe.image_url,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e,"update"),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("label",{children:"Servings"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"number",name:"servings",value:selectedRecipe.servings,onChange:e=>onUpdateForm(e,"update"),required:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Update Recipe"})]})]});};export default EditRecipeForm;
